content: much less frilly moccasins aka the three hour slippers so i ve seen a lot of sock/moccasin/slipper patterns in the last few days as it was one of the best ideas i saw to do for a fundraiser for relay for life i couldn t get permission to use any of them to sell so i decided to come up with my own so far so good and it doesn t bear much resemblance to any other pattern why one word frills all of the patterns seemed to be about the fanciness magic_ring single_crochet trim pompoms fancy heel turns you know what that means more dang knots not good for people who may be going through chemo - their skin in so sensitive and i m trying to make all of the projects for the relay be chemo-friendly so here s my version simple comfy and i m going to make myself a pair after this sale is over materials 1 skein lion brand homespun color used is gothic in this example k crochet hook yarn needle with enlarged head constructing the toe 1 chain 3 2 make 6 half-double crochets half_double_crochet into the second chain tighten the slipknot so that the first chain disappears join and then chain 2 3 now here s where i m going to interject it is darn near impossible to see your stitches at this point because of the type of yarn and the amount of stitches in a very small spot so try to hit all of them twice with a half-double_crochet stitch in total making 12 stitches no matter where they end up chain 2 4 continue making half_double_crochet stitches in here evenly distributing an additional 6 hdcs giving you 18 half_double_crochet stitches total chain 2 4 make 18 half_double_crochet chain 2 5 make 18 half_double_crochet chain 2 6 make 18 half_double_crochet and evenly distribute an additional 9 hdcs 27 half_double_crochet total chain 2 7 make 27 half_double_crochet chain 2 8 make 27 half_double_crochet chain 2 do not fasten_off constructing the foot 1 make 16 half_double_crochet stitches chain 2 and turn repeat approximately 18 times try on slipper every four row stop at the point the slipper reaches the end of your foot do not fasten_off constructing the heel 1 make 16 half_double_crochet stitches chain 2 and turn 2 make 16 half_double_crochet stitches chain 2 and turn fasten_off now leave a 6 inch tail thread your yarn needle with the tail fold the heel panel in half on the width side the length side being the length of your foot plus the toe section sew the two sides together with the stitch of your choice fun huh super easy to make it took me just about three hours to finish the project
